name: deadlock-stacking-crating-bobs-quickfix
title: Deadlock's Crating and Stacking for Bob's and Angel's mods - High-Res Quickfix
author: fuhnert, OhShiny, Xagros
description:
Adds recipes for stacking & crating ores, ingots, plates and intermediates from Bob's, Angel's and related mods.

Fixed so it works with higher-res icons
